articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Brazil play Panama in Group F of the 2023 Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Fifa Women's World Cup: Build-up as Brazil face debutants Panama

articles.description: Wilfried Zaha holds talks with Galatasaray, Allan Saint-Maximin closes on Al-Alhi move and Harry Kane is a top target for European clubs.
articles.title: Transfer latest - Zaha close to Turkey move, Kane chase hots up

articles.description: Saudi Arabian side Al Hilal make a world record £259m bid for Paris St-Germain forward Kylian Mbappe, reports the Press Association.
articles.title: 'Al Hilal make £259m bid for PSG forward Mbappe'

articles.description: England name an unchanged squad for the fifth and final Ashes Test, which begins at The Oval on Thursday.
articles.title: England name unchanged squad for final Ashes Test

articles.description: Germany begin their Women's World Cup campaign in style as captain Alexandra Popp scores twice to see off debutants Morocco in Melbourne.
articles.title: Germany put six past World Cup debutants Morocco

articles.description: Australian media outlets offer a mixed reaction to their side retaining the Ashes courtesy of the rain-affected draw at Old Trafford
articles.title: A hollow ending? Australian media on retaining Ashes

articles.description: Watch highlights as two-time world champions Germany put six goals past World Cup debutants Morocco to secure an easy victory at the Fifa Women's World Cup in Melbourne.
articles.title: Germany cruise to 6-0 win against Morocco

articles.description: Brian Harman choosing to celebrate his Open victory in a local diner on the Wirral created more buzz than when he was on the course, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: 'Harman toasts Open win in American diner with more buzz than Hoylake'

articles.description: Jude Bellingham's Real Madrid career begins with a 3-2 comeback win against AC Milan in a pre-season friendly in California.
articles.title: Bellingham makes Real debut in win over Milan

articles.description: Former West Ham goalkeeper turned TV pundit Shaka Hislop is recovering after collapsing on air in California.
articles.title: Hislop 'conscious' after on-air collapse
